column5: Out this AM on the West Side of Simcoe.  Wasn't sure what I would find for Ice So  the Perch gear was in the truck.  Checked as I traveled and all areas were about 5" clear black Ice.  When I went out everthing was froze tight On the way back after some snow there was water and slush around some cracks.  I sure hope we do not get much snow If we do there will be a lot of Slush!!  The Meegs and the Williams put fish on the Ice.  These 2 came home for the table.  One of Each      See Ya on the Hard Stuff  Rick
Right on Rick. Did you send in some pics to Captain Bruce?
Hope you left a couple for me? Going out Sat am.
NEWS FLASH!!!!  Team 4 gets a bouble barrelled start.
Yes Dawg  There are LOTS out there!!  Cap'n Bruce   We have some "s  I was thinking the Pic looked small and then I clicked on it!!! Budda Boom Budda Bing  Old Guys and Computers!! LOL  Rick

Beauty fish! First thing i thought when i looked at the pic was look how thin that ice is haha...it would scare the s**t out of me sorry lol After looking through 2 feet of ice for the last month, 5-6 inches doesnt look like much
